MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 30-NOV-2020 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the L10 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Cranwell Close and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work involved in repairing an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:05PM on 30th November 2020.
